name: Zappy Rox
description:
Zappy Rox is an Asteroids-inspired arcade game with increasing difficulty every wave.   Try the 'Fullscreen' button.

Controls:

  • START OR RESTART: 'T' key
  • ROTATE : 'A' & 'D' arrow keys 
  • THRUST: 'W' arrow key
  • HYPERJUMP: 'S' arrow key
  • FIRE: 'Spacebar' - can be held down
  • PAUSE: 'P' key
  • CYCLE HIGH SCORE INITIALS: 'A' & 'D' arrow keys 
  • SELECT HIGH SCORE INITIALS: 'Spacebar'
  • EXIT FULLSCREEN: 'Esc' key

Top Tips:

  • Use 'thrust' early on to get used to it.
  • Use 'thrust' when UFOs appear to evade their fire.
  • UFOs can't shoot through rox so use them to hide.
  • Hyperjumps are your friend, use them a lot.
  • Destroy the last remaining rox quickly as the UFOs get mad!
